title: The Right Stuff: Some Episodes in the Career of a North Briton
author: Hay, Ian
snippet: At first sight the cars appeared to be labelled with nothing but Cocoaand Whisky and Empire Palaces of Varieties Open Every Evening; but alittle perseverance discovered a narrow strip of valuable informationpainted along the side of each car. The first that caught our friend'seye was "Pilrig and Braid Hills Road." That would not do.
